sentences.en: Compare sell, vend, peddle , push and flog.
sentences.cn: 试比较sell、vend 、 peddle 、 push、flog这几个词.

sentences.en: Go peddle your papers. I'm certainly not going to pay for the damage that wasn't my fault.
sentences.cn: 你走开吧! 损失不是由于我的过错造成的,我一分钱也不会付给你.

sentences.en: His attempts to peddle his paintings around London's tiny gallery scene proved unsuccessful.
sentences.cn: 他到伦敦小画廊兜售自己的画作，结果碰了一鼻子灰。

sentences.en: I knew next to nothing; how could I peddle myself like some middleaged woman?
sentences.cn: 我知道什么呢, 叫我像个半老的妇人那样去挣钱?

sentences.en: Imagine darling Hugh forced to peddle wood!
sentences.cn: 想想看吧,小小的休竟卖起柴火来了!

sentences.en: Peddle sometimes pleasant , stop and yearn after solicitting many people.
sentences.cn: 叫卖声时而入耳,招揽了不少人驻足留恋.

sentences.en: people who peddle cigarettes to young children
Popeye, the spy, smoking a pipe, peddle papa's papaya and pie.
sentences.cn: 间谍卜派叼烟斗, 沿街叫卖爸爸的木瓜和派.

sentences.en: She has been told to peddle her papers elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 人们告诉她别在这里管闲事.

sentences.en: She loves to peddle gossip round the village.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢在村里到处说闲话.

sentences.en: Street vendors peddle their goods along the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 街头摊贩沿著人行道兜售他们的商品.

sentences.en: They even set up their own news agency to peddle anti-isolationist propaganda.
sentences.cn: 他们甚至设立了自己的通讯社来宣扬反孤立主义。

sentences.en: They were accused of peddling drugs .
To peddle ( goods ) aggressively , especially by calling out.
sentences.cn: 通过叫卖主动兜售 ( 货物 )

sentences.en: When a drug pusher offered the Los Angeles youngster $100 to peddle drugs, Jack refused.
sentences.cn: 一个毒贩给杰克100美元让他贩卖毒品时，这个洛杉矶少年拒绝了。

sentences.en: Why does the farmer wish to sell individual grain to peddle food?
sentences.cn: 为什么农民愿把粮食卖给个体粮贩 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 叫卖的；无关紧要的；琐碎的

trans.tran_en: to sell goods to people, especially goods that people disapprove of because they are illegal, harmful, or of not very high quality

trans.tran_cn: 传播，散播，兜售，叫卖，忙于做琐事
